title: Team Competency Enhancement Program Based on Medical Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Knowledge and Team Collaboration Experience
context.additional_context: Utilizing simulation equipment and virtual patient systems in a BYOD environment, with 5-6 member teams performing role-based practical exercises

learning_goals: Perform low-level cognitive processes (information summarization, diagnostic review) with 80% accuracy when responding to emergency medical scenarios in simulation environments
Observe and document peer metacognitive processes (decision-making rationale, role adjustments) at least three times
Propose two strategies for converting negative emotions (anxiety, frustration) into positive feedback during debriefing sessions
Achieve an average score of 3/4 or higher on simulation evaluation rubrics (leadership, technical proficiency)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
